DOC.brief_summary: The management headache disorder often base upon trial error personal belief opinion . Seldom base scientific argument . Therefore identification prognostic patient characteristic mandatory lead precise referral headache patients.A prospective cohortstudy design identify prognostic patient characteristic . After test , 186 headache patient ( migraine , tension type headache cervicogenic headache ) randomly allocate one two treatment group . Testing include fulfillment questionnaire ( Headache Diagnosis Questionnaire , Headache Inventory Questionnaire Headache Impact Test ) physical test ( Thermal Stimuli , Cervical Spine examination Pressure Algometry ) . Treatment group usual care group ( administer medical doctor ) usual care plus physio-/ manual therapy treatment . After six week treatment subject complete headache inventory list Headache Impact Test second time . The perceived effect register allow distinction responder ( positive effect ) non-responders ( effect worse ) . Logistic regression-analysis use identify specific patient characteristic responder non-responders . Secondly additional value physio-/ manual therapy intervention examine . Follow-up measurement 52 week provide .
DOC.brief_title: Management Headache Disorders : A Clinical Trial Screening Prognostic Patient Characteristics

The use prescribed medication ( like NSAIDs triptans ) headache complaint last two month Pregnancy Red flag describe Dutch General Practitioners Headache Guideline
